title: Do anybody can tell me that when do CBSE schools are going to reopen? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: From my point of view today that rate of corona cases grow in India. It is very difficult to say but some teacher say after 15 August school are reopen and my point of view it will reopen in September or last week of September because today India recorded its highest corona cases near 17,000. So let’s see what happened and i hope you safe from this idiot virus. If you like then why not upvote it.  Image source
